props.dark: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for [dark themes](https://material.io/design/color/dark-theme.html).
props.indeterminate: Sets an indeterminate state for the simple checkbox.
props.indeterminateIcon: The icon used when in an indeterminate state.
props.light: Applies the light theme variant to the component.
props.value: A boolean value that represents whether the simple checkbox is checked.

events.click: Event that is emitted when the component is clicked.
